scripts.cleanup-docker: if [ $(docker ps -a | grep -c selenium-e2e) -gt 0 ]; then docker rm -f $(docker ps --filter "name=selenium-e2e" -aq); fi;
scripts.test-docker: npm run cleanup-docker && docker run -it --shm-size=2g -p 5920:5920 --name selenium-e2e -e TS_SELENIUM_BASE_URL=$TS_SELENIUM_BASE_URL eclipse/che-e2e:nightly
scripts.test-docker-mount-e2e: npm run cleanup-docker && docker run -it --shm-size=2g -p 5920:5920 --name selenium-e2e -e TS_SELENIUM_BASE_URL=$TS_SELENIUM_BASE_URL -v $(pwd):/tmp/e2e:Z eclipse/che-e2e:nightly
scripts.test: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha.json
scripts.load-test: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-load.json
scripts.test-happy-path: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-happy-path.json
scripts.test-devworkspace-happy-path: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-devworkspace-happy-path.json
scripts.test-wkspc-creation-and-ls: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-wkspc-creation-and-ls
scripts.test-java-vertx: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-java-vertx.json
scripts.test-git-ssh: ./generateIndex.sh &&  npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-git-ssh.json
scripts.test-git-self-sign-cert: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-git-self-sign-cert.json
scripts.test-git-publish-branch: ./generateIndex.sh &&  npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-git-publish-branch.json
scripts.test-openshift-connector: ./generateIndex.sh &&  npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-connector.json
scripts.test-factory: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-factory.json
scripts.test-all-factories: ./generateIndex.sh && npm run lint && npm run tsc && mocha --config mocha-all-factories.json
scripts.test-plugin-ci: export TS_DELETE_PLUGINS_TEST_WORKSPACE=true && npm run init-mocha-opts -- --spec dist/tests/plugins/${USERSTORY}.spec.js
